history.content: hi, what did you end up deciding to do with the course?

Hi everyone I am interested in doing a master's program in AI but I did really bad on my exam on CS 182 that would probably get me a B in the class. If I don't do well enough on the 2nd midterm, I am thinking about PNP the class. However, I've read that pnp a class is really bad for grad school admission if it's related to your area of interest. I am graduating so I can't really retake the class either. In this case, should I just late drop the class if I do poorly on the 2nd midterm as well? I've taken other AI-related classes and done well in them, so would it be fine if I just drop 182? But in that case, my transcript would only have 2 classes for this semester(already pnp one of them) which is kind of weird. I really don't know what's the best solution here. Please help, thanks!
history.subject: PNP/drop major class important for grad school
